10
11#include "./vpx_dsp_rtcd.h"
12
13uint64_t vpx_sum_squares_2d_i16_c(const int16_t *src, int stride, int size) {
14 int r, c;
15 uint64_t ss = 0;
16
17 for (r = 0; r < size; r++) {
18 for (c = 0; c < size; c++) {
19 const int16_t v = src[c];
20 ss += v * v;
21 }
22 src += stride;
23 }
24
25 return ss;
26}
27
